entry.value: Generate a conversation between 2 people in {{foreign}} about {{topic}} of 8 messages, return the data as a json string that contains a list of all the messages as a strings list (named conversation and contains only the messages without the names of the senders) and a map of vocabulary from that conversation (only hard interesting words) which contains the word as key and the definition (in {{native}}) as value. If the language is not {{native}}, the json should contain also a list of the messages translated into {{native}} (named translation)
